Precise Strike: Ignores 6 points of foe DR

Aid (Faithful2 Ench): Touched gains +1 attack and fear saves and 1d8+10 temporary HP for 10 min
Bless (Faithful1 Ench): Allies in 50' radius gain +1 attack and fear saves for 10 min

Divine Favor (Faithful1 Evoc): Self gains +3 attack and damage for 1 min
Prestidigitation (Ch0 Evoc): R10' Self performs minor tricks for 1 hr
Protection From Evil (Faithful1 Abju): Touched gains +2 AC and saves vs. evil creatures, suppresses mental control, and bars contact by nongood summoned creatures for 10 min
Sending (Ch5 Evoc): Self has two-way, 25-word exchange w/familiar target
